STATUS = 2 AND DATE_FORMAT(c.last_update, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{from} AND #{to}) AS tmp,
(select m1.id, m1.shop_name as shopName, m1.shop_location as shopLocation, m1.shop_contact as shopContact from manager m1 where m1.proxy_id = #{proxyId}) as tmp1 LEFT JOIN device d ON tmp1.id = d.shop_id GROUP BY tmp1.id

select (select SUM(consumed_duration) from consumed_details c where c.proxy_id=m.id) as totalIncome, (select count(1) from manager m1 where m1.proxy_id = m.id) as totalShop, (select count(1) from device d where d.proxy_id = m.id) as totalDevice
from manager m where m.id=#{id}
select (sum(c.consumed_duration) * m1.shop_percent/100 ) as dayIncome from manager m1 left JOIN consumed_details c on c.shop_id=m1.id where m1.proxy_id=#{proxyId} group by m1.id

select d.id as id, d.device_no as deviceNo, sum(consumed_duration) as totalDuration, (sum(consumed_duration) * ( select shop_percent/100 from manager where id=d.shop_id) )as totalIncome from device d left join consumed_details c on d.id=c.device_id where d.shop_id=#{shopId} and c.status=2 and DATE_FORMAT(c.last_update,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{from} and #{to} group by d.id
